meanings.definition: The state or quality of being unclean.
meanings.sent1: The uncleanlinesses of the room were evident from the dirty floors and dusty shelves.
meanings.sent2: She always made sure to clean thoroughly to avoid any uncleanlinesses in her home.
meanings.sent3: The uncleanlinesses of the kitchen were so bad that even the mice refused to stay.
meanings.sent4: The uncleanlinesses of his mind were like a fog, clouding his thoughts and judgments.
meanings.sent5: The uncleanlinesses of the city streets were a stark reminder of the neglect of public spaces.

meanings.definition: Actions or habits that result in being unclean.
meanings.sent1: Leaving food out for days can lead to uncleanlinesses attracting pests.
meanings.sent2: Her uncleanlinesses included not washing her hands before meals and wearing dirty clothes.
meanings.sent3: His uncleanlinesses were so extreme that his friends jokingly called him 'Mr. Messy'.
meanings.sent4: The uncleanlinesses of his lifestyle were dragging him down, both physically and mentally.
meanings.sent5: Ignoring basic hygiene practices can quickly lead to uncleanlinesses and health issues.
